alert.note: Alert for Cascades in Lane County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 03 at 2:33PM PST until January 05 at 12:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT PST TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches of snow through Tuesday evening. Most of this snow will fall Tuesday afternoon into Tuesday evening. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Cascades in Lane County. * WHEN...Until midnight PST Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
